EmailTemplate.name: T2 Mids Follow up
EmailTemplate.subject: Take 2 Programme - Last Few Places Available
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
If you haven't yet signed up for the Take Two programme, it's your last chance. There are only a few places left so make sure you get your application in soon.
The link to apply is: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1N9N0j39zB4ijNf1TVTtXM8y-Z_5fpeygo8GO7uNc6oM/viewform?usp=send_form
If you don't take this space up in the next two days it will be offered out to more people and you will lose your opportunity.
If you want a reminder of what Take 2 is about, watch this Youtube vid.
If you have already applied, we will be in touch soon with more info.
Have a great day,
Liam
